description: The Jazz Ensemble program offers the opportunity to play the music of the big bands of the 20th and 21st centuries as well as exploring newer forms of the genre. Admission to one of the three jazz ensembles is based on yearly auditions and available openings. The ensemble conductor provides full details of all rehearsal and performance obligations. P/N only. May be repeated.
name: Jazz I
